text:
- I am proud to say at Wipro,
we've been at the forefront
of cutting edge technologies

and focused towards
bringing business value
to our customers over the past 75 years.

AWS is our partner and offers
a wide range of benefits.

AWS Enterprise Support is a
premium offering designed by AWS

for their customers who bring
in mission critical workloads.

Personally speaking, they're
extremely easy to work with,
understand customer objectives
by embedding themselves seamlessly

into the customer's
organization as one team

whilst giving them
strong technical advice.

- At Wipro, our journey
of cloud transformation
has been significantly enriched
through the steady first partnership
with AWS Enterprise Support.
It commenced with addressing management
and governance challenges

where the team showcased
an in-depth understanding
of our need.

Their guidance in implementing
AWS single sign-on

proved instrumental in
elevating productivity,
fortifying security measures,

and ultimately enhancing the
overall customer experience.
As Wipro, business experience growth.

The significance of securing
workload in accordance
with Wipro's security standard

and cloud security best
practices became paramount.
To address these challenges,

AWS Enterprise Support
introduced the advantage
of Control Tower.

AWS TAM conducted control
tower immersion days

and technical enablement
sessions to familiarize our team
with Control Tower framework.

Despite demanding
approximately four months

of reckless dedication
and close collaboration,

this endeavor resulted in
successful implementation
of the Control Tower.

We possess the requisite
security guardrails,

enabling business operations
in a matter of minutes,

and significantly enhancing
our operation efficiency
and productivity.

Recognizing that optimal
cloud performance hinges
on effective cloud financial management,
our collaboration with TAM led
to a series of strategic action,
resulting in annual cost saving
of almost $1 million on AWS Cloud.
Several actions were implemented

to enhance automation
and DevOps practices.
Cloud operations review
and security improvement program helped
to streamline our processes.

The outcome was heightened
employee productivity,

improved operation efficiency,
and cost reduction.
- Social good is in our DNA.
On AWS, Wipro is able to save 298 MtCO
on the carbon emissions this year.

Partnering with AWS and
having Enterprise Support

as a trusted ally significantly
amplifies our capabilities,

allowing us to scale and
attain remarkable milestones.

We eagerly anticipate
our strong collaboration
on the cloud transformation journey.
(upbeat music)
